summary: New model of unique Shield of Solitude
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffff00][size=5]Shield of Solitude replacer Eng/Rus v1.0[/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Times New Roman][size=3][color=#1e84cc]

[/color][color=#ffff00]Author:[/color]
Ronnie Magnum - mesh, textures.

[color=#ffff00]Description:[/color]
This mod replaces the model of unique Shield of Solitude, that can be obtained as a reward after completion of the quest "The Wolf Queen Awakened". Other parameters of this shield are not changed, only the model of all leveled versions of it.



[size=3][center][size=4][size=4][size=6]***[/size][/size][/size][/center]
[size=4]
Also:[/size]

Wanna see my another Skyrim mods? Check my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2931683]Skyrimnexus page[/url].

On my [url=http://ronnietheblacksmith.deviantart.com/]Deviantart page[/url]...

Or join me on [url=https://www.patreon.com/RonnieMagnum/overview]Patreon[/url] if you like my works![/size][/size][/font]
author: Ronnie Magnum
